Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 54th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2007...
Traded from Philadelphia to Chicago (N) on 3/2/2008 (Going to PHI: P D. Lowe. Going to CHN: CF J. Borbon, RF D. Mohr)...
Injured on 4/19/2008 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 9/6/2011, off John Axford (WSH)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/14/2011, off Jeff Gray (SF)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Colorado on 1/31/2013 (Going to COL: LF J. Borbon. Going to CHN: SS A. Hill, P H. Cornejo)...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Arizona on 4/24/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 8/8/2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2014...
Had 44-game hitting streak snapped on 6/3/2015...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Minnesota on 6/4/2015...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Houston on 8/18/2015...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against St. Louis on 9/29/2015...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/16/2016, hitting .536 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Philadelphia on 4/25/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/16/2017...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Washington on 6/9/2017...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 7/30/2017...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Pittsburgh on 8/22/2017...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 4/12/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/16/2018, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/17/2018 with a Bruised Heel, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Cleveland on 5/29/2019...
Injured on 7/2/2019 with a Torn Rib Cage Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Colorado to Los Angeles (A) on 7/31/2019 (Going to COL: C U. Ramos, LF C. Jordan, P R. Comacho. Going to LAA: CF J. Borbon)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 6/20/2020...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Boston on 7/5/2020...
Injured on 7/17/2020 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/10/2021 with a Fractured Hip, out for 6-7 weeks...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/26/2022, hitting .464 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/2/2022, off Tony Watson (OAK)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Oakland on 8/14/2022...
